title: Can I become a hacker without computer science in my 12th? - Quora

response.answer_text: Computer science background of 12th is not needed to become a hacker. But if possible join B.Tech or something in computer science background, which will help you to learn hacking very fastly. Even if you can’t don't worry. If you have strong passion to learn hacking and willing to dedicate yourself, then you can learn basics from books and tutorials availavle. Then join a certification course.
